title: ðŸ¤– AI Assistant
description:
Your personal AI assistant for Mac!

Featuring smart translation, voice dictation with offline support, AI-powered text improvement, and web page summarization.
Seamlessly integrates with your workflow for instant translations, voice-to-text, content generation, and quick summaries - all without leaving your current app.
author: pezzos

commands.name: translate
commands.title: Translate Selected Text
commands.description:
Smart translation between your primary languages with automatic language detection.
Preserves formatting, punctuation, and technical terms while optionally improving grammar.
Example: Write an email in English, select the text and instantly translate it to French while maintaining its tone.

commands.name: dictate
commands.title: Dictate Text
commands.description:
Convert speech to text with high accuracy using online (OpenAI) or local Whisper models.
Features automatic language detection, optional translation, text improvement, and personal dictionary integration.

Example: Dictate meeting notes in any language and have them automatically cleaned up and formatted.

commands.name: dictate-prompt
commands.title: Dictate AI Prompt
commands.description:
Use voice commands to generate or modify text with AI.
Perfect for emails, essays, code comments, drafting new docs, or any text content.

Example: Say 'Write a professional email to decline the meeting invitation from John, explain I already have another meeting with Steve about the new features' and get a perfectly crafted response.

commands.name: settings
commands.title: Settings
commands.description:
Configure AI Assistant preferences including language settings, AI models, speech recognition mode, audio settings, and feature toggles.
Manage your personal dictionary and local Whisper models for offline use.

commands.name: summarize-page
commands.title: Summarize a Text or the Current Page
commands.description:
Get an AI-powered summary of any selected text or full web page with key points highlighted.
Includes optional 'Explore More' suggestions and supports multiple languages.

Example: Quickly understand a long article by getting a concise summary with main takeaways.

commands.name: dictate-models
commands.title: Manage Whisper Models
commands.description:
Install and manage local Whisper speech recognition models for offline use.
Choose between different model sizes (Tiny, Base, Small, Medium) to balance speed and accuracy based on your needs.

commands.name: dictate-dictionary
commands.title: Manage Personal Dictionary
commands.description:
Create and manage your custom dictionary for accurate transcription of technical terms, names, and specific phrases.
Perfect for ensuring consistent spelling and formatting of industry-specific terminology.

commands.name: dictate-dictionary-add
commands.title: Add Selected Word to Dictionary
commands.description:
Quickly add selected words or phrases to your personal dictionary with their correct spelling or preferred format directly from everywhere.
Useful for adding technical terms, proper nouns, or frequently used expressions on the fly if they are not well transcribed.

commands.name: dictate-history
commands.title: View Dictation History
commands.description:
Access and manage your past dictation sessions with full metadata including timestamps, source language, and any translations or improvements applied.
Easily copy or reuse previous transcriptions.
